programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Long and the Short of It
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing meal featuring long and short ingredients! Josh makes a long sandwich, long grain rice, and a Long Island iced tea in a short glass, while Erica prepares long pepper short ribs, short grain rice, long beans, and long noodles!

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner
programme.desc: Chef Dev shows off a whole day’s worth of street food meals, including Halwa Puri from Pakistan for breakfast, Beef Patties from Jamaica for lunch, and Mapo Tofu from China for dinner.

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.desc: Chef Dev prepares some of his favorite South Asian street foods, including Nihari Stew from Pakistan, Momo Dumplings from Nepal, and sweet Jalebi from India.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Beans, Raspberry Jam and Relish
programme.desc: On today's Fresh Market Dinners menu, host Amanda Herrera prepares succulent burgers with golden fries and a refreshing cocktail.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Cream, Sunflower Oil and Cherry Tomatoes
programme.desc: Using cream, sunflower oil and cherry tomatoes from the market, host Amanda Herrera makes an irresistible pasta recipe and indulgent dessert.

programme.title: One World Kitchen Bakes the Holidays
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 One World Kitchen Bakes the Holidays
programme.desc: Celebrate the holidays with One World Kitchen's baked treats from Italy, Japan, Thailand, and Argentina. Our hosts Vanessa, Hana, Pailin, and Natalia put a global twist on classic recipes with Panforte, honey-drizzled Struffoli, Matcha Cheesecake, Thai Shortbread Cookies, TurrÃ³n, and Pan Dulce. Our warm hosts serve up sweet treats inspired by traditions and family secrets. One World Kitchen: Bakes the Holidays will put you in the festive spirit and bring new holiday traditions to your home!

programme.title: BLITZ'N
programme.desc: Get ready for a special holiday BLITZ! with master mixologist Yvonne Langen as she prepares her favorite holiday cocktails and party snacks in the Gusto TV kitchen!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever: Holiday Edition
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Wizard of Whatever: Holiday Edition
programme.desc: Gusto TV’s Wizard of Whatever, Chef Kyle Crawford, is dishing up a holiday feast! There’ll be food, fun, elves… and even jolly old St. Nick himself may make an appearance! Join in as Kyle cooks up a Christmas goose complete with stuffing and gravy, plus all the sides and salads, and even a flashy flambé dessert! Merry whatever!

programme.title: Flour Power Holiday Specials
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Twists on the Classics
programme.desc: Christmas is right around the corner and it calls for a little fun - like a twist on traditional holiday desserts! FLOUR POWER CHRISTMAS: TWISTS ON THE CLASSICS offers a new take on some of your favourites to bring you a fresh perspective and world of flavour for the holidays! Enchanting host Jessica McGovern plays off classic desserts, serving up handy hints on how to get the most out of every bite. From sweet and fluffy Gumdrop Cakes drizzled with a light lemony glaze to a delectable Eggnog Ski Slope Cake decorated with rosemary trees and a few friends to hit the hills, Jessica's unique holiday recipes will surly make it on your list of Christmas traditions!

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Our Favourite Holiday Recipes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 One World Kitchen: Our Favourite Holiday Recipes
programme.desc: In this special holiday episode of One World Kitchen, Hana (Japan), Vanessa (Italy), Natalia (Argentina), and Pailin (Thailand) get together to cook their favorite traditional holiday dishes influenced by their respective cultures. Christmas Sushi Rolls, Veal in a Creamy Tuna Sauce with Capers, Striped Bass in Garlic and Lime Marinade, and an epic Timballo. For the final recipe, our hosts combine all the flavors of One World Kitchen into a truly internationally-inspired turkey dish.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italian Christmas
programme.desc: BONACINI'S ITALIAN CHRISTMAS is a heartwarming one-hour holiday special featuring celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini as he shares some of his favourite Italian Christmas Eve dishes. Michael invites us to the set of his series "Bonacini's Italy" to cook up traditional Italian fare like Salt Cod Mousse on Polenta Crostini and Pork Braised in Milk. Michael takes us on a holiday culinary journey as he explores homey Christmas flavours and traditions, offering tips for perfecting dishes from the regions of Veneto, Sardinia, Calabria, Sicily, and Emilia Romagna.

programme.title: Flour Power Holiday Specials
programme.desc: The holidays are here! And the holidays come with a lineup of treats you won't be able to resist! From sweet and salty to traditional and unconventional, FLOUR POWER CHRISTMAS: BIG WOW DESSERTS covers it all. To get in the holiday spirit, enchanting host Jessica McGovern introduces two desserts that could impress any Scrooge. First, Jessica bakes a decadent Chocolate Yule Log stuffed with a creamy Salted Caramel Frosting and finishes with a holiday-inspired cake decorated with homemade peppermint candy canes! Interwoven with tricks of the trade, Jessica guides us through her simple yet inspiring treats that are perfect for a big Christmas celebration.

programme.title: Spencer's Big Holiday
programme.desc: No matter how you celebrate the holidays, let Spencer Watts help you plan the menu, in SPENCER’S BIG HOLIDAY! In this festive one-hour holiday special, Spencer Watts is serving up some of his favourite holiday meals, treats, and drinks. Follow Spencer as he shows us how to sail through the hectic holiday season with style, from brunch to the moment the clock strikes midnight.

programme.title: One BIG Holiday Recipe
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 One BIG Holiday Recipe
programme.desc: One BIG Recipe is all about cooking for family and friends and so are the holidays! Check out cool chef Kimberly Lallouz's take on holiday favourites in this special seasonal episode. Her first course is a Moroccan spiced Beet Latke with lightly dressed greens and creme fraiche. Next, whole fennel is braised tender, gratineed and spiked with apple chutney. Entrees include a one-of-a-king Turkey Breast 'Buche de Noel' roulade and a juicy, beefy espresso-red wine spiked Brisket roast. Along with her main course come her unique, single-serving Stuffin' muffins, two sauces, sugar snap peas and watermelon radishes. And don't leave without her sweet hostess gifts, White Chocolate Brittle-Bark...

programme.title: Flour Power Holiday Specials
programme.desc: Christmas is near, and the pressure is on! Between work, home, friends, and family, the list of people to buy for is endless. To help us through this busy time, FLOUR POWER CHRISTMAS: EDIBLE GIFTS offers up four creative and more personal options to make the holidays cheaper, sweeter, and filled with love. Fun host Jessica McGovern shows us how to bake something for everyone including Crispy Brittle Bark covered in chocolate, rich Coal Cookies that are sweet with a bit of heat, adorable peanut butter-chocolate Reindeer Cupcakes, and easy-to-make Christmas Puzzle Cookies.

programme.title: Christmas With Bonacini

programme.title: One BIG Holiday Recipe
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 One BIG Holiday Recipe
programme.desc: One BIG Recipe is all about cooking for family and friends and so are the holidays! Check out cool chef Kimberly Lallouz's take on holiday favourites in this special seasonal episode. Her first course is a Moroccan spiced Beet Latke with lightly dressed greens and creme fraiche. Next, whole fennel is braised tender, gratineed and spiked with apple chutney. Entrees include a one-of-a-king Turkey Breast 'Buche de Noel' roulade and a juicy, beefy espresso-red wine spiked Brisket roast. Along with her main course come her unique, single-serving Stuffin' muffins, two sauces, sugar snap peas and watermelon radishes. And don't leave without her sweet hostess gifts, White Chocolate Brittle-Bark...

programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera shows us why fresh is always best with two creative dishes using ingredients from the farmers' market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Raspberries, Mint, Peas and Apricot
programme.desc: Zestful cook Amanda Herrera scoops up raspberries, peas, mint, and apricots to use in three summer recipes.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Collard Greens, Maple Syrup, Goat Cheddar and Heirloom Cherry Tomatoes
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera prepares a frittata, rosemary skewer chicken and grilled bread salad with fresh ingredients from a local farmers' market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Broccoli, Rainbow Chard and Herbs
programme.desc: Warm host Amanda Herrera picks up colourful produce and herbs at a farmers' market to make a delicious appetizer and tasty cold oil French fries.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Thai food inspired by other cultures
programme.desc: Thai chef and cookbook author Pailin Chongchitnant shows us how to make Thai dishes that were inspired by other cultures, from steamed dumplings to biryani to Massaman curry and custard tarts.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Argentinian-born chef Natalia Machado makes grilled calamari salad, followed by grilled pizza, and then shows us how to make lamb ravioli, before finishing it off with the best-ever cookies: alfajores.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Warm and talented Cantonese home cook Mary Tang kick starts this One World Kitchen 3 episode by show- casing traditional, evERS-popular dim-sum dishes. First up, juicy Pork-Filled Dumplings! Made with fresh watERS-chest- nuts, shiitake mushrooms and a blend of Asian sauces and spices, these sweet and salty bite-sized creations are to die for! To add to our desire, Mary fries up some savoury Chinese Daikon Radish Cakes in a piping hot wok. Next, a flavourful lotus leaf filled with sticky rice and a medley of salted duck eggs, Shaoxing wine, and dried shrimp is truly hard to resist! To finish off, Mary combines gorgeous Adzuki beans with rice flour and sesame seeds to create airy and full...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Vietnamese food with a French Twist
programme.desc: Lisa Nguyen, a passionate and fun-loving Vietnamese home cook, introduces us to some of her favourite Vietnamese dishes with a French flare. Set in the colourful One World Kitchen 3 kitchen, Lisa assembles a classic Vietnamese sandwich. Golden-brown sautéed onions, salty bacon, tangy pickled carrots and daikon, and flavourful ground pork p'té pressed between two slices of crispy baguette will definitely get your mouth salivating. Next up, hot pork lathered in cognac inside a crunchy golden puff pastry. Moving away from pork, Lisa then cooks up a hearty plate of Shaking Beef with a leafy watercress salad on the side. Finally, Lisa shows us her Vietnamese play on a traditional French...

programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Vietnam - Vietnamese Green Beans, Lebanon - Watermelon Tabbouleh, China - Signapore-Style Spaghetti Squash Noodles, and Germany - Celeriac Sauerbraten and Slaw!

programme.title: Global Veggies

programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera transforms fresh market ingredients into two irresistible dishes, including a one pot Lamb Curry with Honeycomb.

programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera grills up two dinner recipes using patty pan summer squash and cabbage that she picked up from the market.

programme.desc: On today's Fresh Market Dinners menu, host Amanda Herrera prepares succulent burgers with golden fries and a refreshing cocktail.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Cream, Sunflower Oil and Cherry Tomatoes
programme.desc: Using cream, sunflower oil and cherry tomatoes from the market, host Amanda Herrera makes an irresistible pasta recipe and indulgent dessert.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini uses the fresh ingredients from rich Tuscan soil to make regional dishes like Spinach Ricotta Gnudi.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini explores classic dishes from the central Italian region, Le Marche.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: The secluded region of Abruzzo makes for unique Italian cuisine. Chef Michael Bonacini shows us diverse regional recipes like Rolled Meat Crepes.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Pasta, bread, pizza dough! Host Michael Bonacini makes Apulian classics like Artichoke Cheese Panzerotti.

programme.title: MKHBB
programme.desc: MKHBB

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Vietnamese food with a French Twist
programme.desc: Lisa Nguyen, a passionate and fun-loving Vietnamese home cook, introduces us to some of her favourite Vietnamese dishes with a French flare. Set in the colourful One World Kitchen 3 kitchen, Lisa assembles a classic Vietnamese sandwich. Golden-brown sautéed onions, salty bacon, tangy pickled carrots and daikon, and flavourful ground pork p'té pressed between two slices of crispy baguette will definitely get your mouth salivating. Next up, hot pork lathered in cognac inside a crunchy golden puff pastry. Moving away from pork, Lisa then cooks up a hearty plate of Shaking Beef with a leafy watercress salad on the side. Finally, Lisa shows us her Vietnamese play on a traditional French...

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of Vietnamese style clams, braised greens, balsamic Cipollini onions, pork chops with grilled peaches, and avocado cake with avocado frosting.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: There's nothing more authentic than street food - Vietnamese style! Host Lisa Nguyen shares her tips and tricks on tasty Lemongrass-infused Beef Wraps. A vast array of ingredients including peppery betel leaves, gorgeous greens and crunchy peanuts complement the tenderness of flavoursome, marinated ground beef. Lisa's next dish is an iconic Vietnamese street food - crispy Sizzling Crepes with juicy pork belly and earthy vegetables will definitely activate your taste buds. For dessert, Lisa whips up a batch of sweet coconut pudding using beautiful bananas and velvety coconut milk sprinkled with roasted sesame seeds for some crunch.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Four Flavours, Four Dishes…One Multi-Cooker!
programme.desc: Using just one pot, host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks four delicious dishes including Peachy Pulled Pork Tacos and a Lime and Basil Pie.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Say goodbye to dirty cutlery in this One World Kitchen 3 episode featuring Vietnamese finger foods! Talented cook Lisa Nguyen starts off by making delicious Pork Skewer Rolls - perfect for any party! Featuring tender pork, crispy lettuce, fresh mint, crunchy cucumber, and Chinese chives wrapped in soft rice paper, this dish pairs well with a nuoc cham dipping sauce. Sticky Lemongrass Spare Ribs are next up to the plate; steamed and marinated in a garlicy, caramel glaze (yum!). Next, Lisa fries up some tasty Shrimp and Sweet Potato Fritters using a foolproof technique, adding nuoc cham dipping sauce and lovely Bibb lettuce on the side. Finally, fingERS-licking Vietnamese Coffee Cupcakes...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 A Banquet fit for an Emperor
programme.desc: Elegant Vietnamese fare is often inspired by legendary imperial city cuisine. In this One World Kitchen 3 episode, Host Lisa Nguyen gives us a magical taste of royalty with four colourful and delectable dishes. To start, Lisa ex- quisitely assembles a nice little starter for a royal dinner party - delicious Rice Cakes with Dried Shrimp. Next, she kicks it up a notch with a Spicy Hue Beef Noodle Soup - a truly slurp-worthy dish! For a touch of sweetness, Lisa then steams caramelized pork and tender shrimp dumplings in a lovely banana leaf. And there's no such thing as a classy Vietnamese dinner party without Baby Clams with Rice! The blend of contrasting flavours and textures in this...

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Jesse Magallanes was raised in an Argentinian household, but he knows there's more to his ancestry. Host Tyrone Edwards reveals the results of his DNA test and Jesse begins his journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Chelsea Richards comes from a Jamaican family but suspects there is more to her ancestry. Host Tyrone Edwards gives her the shock of her life when he reveals the results of her DNA test.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Host Tyrone Edwards reveals the exciting results of Carmen Araiza's DNA test. She embarks on a journey of self-discovery, learning about her newfound culture through cooking.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Adopted Tara Broadbent is shocked by the results of her DNA test and learns more about her biological ancestry through food.

programme.title: Let's Brunch
programme.desc: Smiling host Vanessa Gianfrancesco loves Bread for Brunch and so will you! In this episode she shares mouthwatering mid-morning bread recipes.

programme.title: Let's Brunch

programme.title: Let's Brunch

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Who said dessert couldn't come before dinner? In this episode of Up the Dish, host Missy Hui serves up a hedonistically hard-to-beat Carrot Cake, made extra-moist with applesauce and tons of cream cheese icing. Micah Trainor ditches dessert and heads for the healthy option - a Cider Poached Chicken Waldorf Salad full of pecans and cinnamon for that classic cake flavour. Poppy Sandler innovates with Indian inspiration - carrot cake becomes Carrot Rostis, thin pancakes dished out with perfectly poached eggs and a homemade savoury raisin jam. Tiera Singh returns to the Rock and makes Jerk Crab Salad Mango Rolls. Jazzing up the crab meat with a blend of Jamaican jerk and autumn spices, she...

programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing meal based on childhood memories! Josh makes pan con tomate, Bolognese, and strawberry ice cream, while Erica prepares paella, churros, and sangria!

programme.desc: This is truely a world premiere: 115 of the world’s best drone-racing pilots from 32 nations will converge at the first ever FAI World Drone Racing Championships in the city of Shenzhen, Southern China, for 4 days of high-calibre racing.

programme.title: Trans Napoli - A Mountain Bike Expedition Naples (ITA)
programme.desc: TransNapoli is an urban MTB adventure led by legendary mountain bike pioneer Hans Rey. It is a colorful five-day tour that crosses the Amalfi and Naples regions of Italy on mountain bikes and e-bikes.

programme.title: Climbing Special - Worldwide
programme.desc: Kashmir, the Moab Desert, the famous Matterhorn, icefalls in Norway and Patagonia. We look back on breathtaking adventures, incredible alpine records and never-before-imagined new ascents

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2022 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 4th stop. This takes place in Austria at Fieberbrunn, (AUT). It is exciting to see what the first stop of the final has to offer after the spectacular three qualifying stages!

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of
programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: FIA Championship Middle East - Saudi Baja Hall
programme.desc: The Saudi Baja is an important event in the FIA Middle East Baja Cup series. It takes place from January 30 to February 1, 2025 and serves as the opening round of the FIA World Cup for Cross-Country Bajas and the FIM Bajas World Cup.

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Kühtai (AUT)
programme.desc: Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. To begin, athletes gain momentum by “paddling,” dragging their hands along the ice to propel themselves forward.

programme.title: New Zealand Winter Games 2018 - JWCH Ski & SNB Cross (NZL)
programme.desc: The stars of the Olympic, Paralympic and X Games are once again traveling to New Zealand's Southern Alps to take part in the first major winter sports championships of the season.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Winterleiten (AUT)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Expedition Antarctica - Caro North - Antarctic
programme.desc: Ice climbing, ski mountaineering and days of sailing on open waters through the infamous Drake Passage: 28-year-old extreme athlete Caro North set off for a four-week expedition to the far south of our continent.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air Kite & GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships - Gran Canaria (ESP)
programme.desc: Gran Canaria will host the GKA Big Air Kite World Championships and the GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships in July 2024. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the titles and show impressive skills in kiteboarding and wingfoiling.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup - Sylt (GER)
programme.desc: Sylt is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup 2024, which brings together the best riders in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and big air hydrofoiling.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup - Dunkerque (FRA)
programme.desc: Dunkerque is the venue for the GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. Athletes from all over the world compete for the title and show impressive tricks, power moves and technical skills.

programme.title: Faces of Valais - Teil 1
programme.desc: Valais is the third-biggest canton of Switzerland. It’s situated in the Southwest of Switzerland. We explored this stunning landscape for more than a year. The central element in our voyage though was water.

programme.title: Faces of Valais - Teil 2
programme.desc: Valais is the third-biggest canton of Switzerland. It’s situated in the Southwest of Switzerland. We explored this stunning landscape for more than a year. The central element in our voyage though was water.

programme.title: adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Bouldern & Climbing 2013
programme.desc: Highball bouldering in Switzerland’s Ticino and the redpoint ascent of the “Rote Wand” in /VorarlbergAustria. Beside adrenaline packed action this is also a story of trust and friendship as well as responsibility for yourself.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #01
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #02
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 46

programme.desc: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 2

programme.title: WOF 2025 #01: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship 2024
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports 2025 and to the thrilling finale of the BrinxWorld Downhill Skateboarding Championship2024 from the breathtaking slopes of Roan Mountain, USA, where speed meets skill and gravity takes no prisoners.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #02: Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: Today we look back at the 2024 Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup – a season of breathtaking tricks, fierce competition, and unforgettable moments. Join us as we relive the highlights, celebrate the champions, and wrap up an incredible year on the water!

programme.title: WOF 2025 #03: World Rookie Tour Skate & Snow
programme.desc: World Rookie Tour Skate & Snow / Europe: A look back at the skate highlights of the 2023 World Rookie Tour. Then we show the best of the 2024 ski and snowboard action. And finally, we let it rip once again - with the 2024 Skate Finals!

programme.title: WOF 2025 #04: Maneuvre Vancouvre - with Hans Rey
programme.desc: In “Maneuver Vancouver”, mountain bike icons Hans Rey, Steve Peat and Wade Simmons embark on an exciting five-day journey through Vancouver. Join these three legends as they explore this iconic city.

programme.title: Kahuna
programme.desc: Four young engineering students set sail from Lorient, France, in March 2022 aboard Kahuna, their self-built electric sailboat. For five months, they explored the Arctic slopes of Norway and Svalbard, mastering skiing, sailing, filming and climbed 40 peaks.

programme.title: No Man_s Land
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #5 - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Freeride World Tour 2022 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The final showdown of the Freeride World Tour 2022 is right around the corner and it’ll take place in Verbier, Switzerland between 26th of March and 3rd of April.

programme.title: Mbuzi Dume - Strong Goat - Kilimandscharo (TZN)
programme.desc: Tom Belz was faced with the challenge of his life: The 31-year-old goes through life with one leg and two crutches and then climbs the highest mountain in Africa. He also wants to encourage others with his own story.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup & GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Dakhla (MAR)
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup and the GWA Wingfoil World Cup in Dakhla, Morocco, bring together the best kite surfers and wingfoilers in the world. The riders show off their technical skills and innovation in the wave riding disciplines.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera in Brazil is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: Jericoacoara/Brazil welcomes the Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best kiteboarders test the limits of big air. This hotspot provides a stage for breathtaking jumps, technical tricks and intense competitions.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Cauipe (BRA)
programme.desc: The Cauipe lagoon is the venue for the Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. The Brazilian paradise offers the perfect playground for explosive tricks.

programme.title: Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 - Live delayed (Vert/Bowl/Street) Part 1
programme.desc: The Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 celebrates its 30th anniversary at the legendary Štvanice Island Skatepark. This international skateboarding event welcomes over 180 riders from all over the world to compete in the street, bowl and vert disciplines.

programme.title: Defender GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sylt (GER) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno
programme.desc: Cape Verde is hosting the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the best kitesurfers in the world like Elena Moreno. From breathtaking freestyle tricks to impressive racing moments, her determination and talent are on display.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Sal (CPV)

programme.title: Sunny

programme.title: Trans Napoli - A Mountain Bike Expedition Naples (ITA)

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Moscow (RUS)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Snow Bike Festival 2019 - Gstaad (SUI)

programme.title: The legend of Muksu river - Tajikistan

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A huge title fight rematch will take place in the main event as rivals Tiffany ‘Time Bomb’ van Soest (24-6-2, 9 KO) and Sarah Moussaddak (8-3, 1 KO) lock horns once again. The rest of the card is stacked with some exciting names and thrilling fights. French Algerian Nordine Mahieddine (27-15, 12 KO) collides with France’s Abderahmane Coulibaly (58-20-1, 25 KO) in a big heavyweight contest, Germany’s Denis Wosik (37-8-1, 9 KO) meets the super popular Albanian Berjan Peposhi (27-3, 16 KO), former GLORY title challenger Karim Ghajji (103-17-1, 53 KO) returns and squares-off against Serbia’s Nikola Todorovic (26-3, 14 KO), and Iliass Hammouche (32-6, 7 KO) will finally make his much...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 36 SuperFight Series is headlined by Congolese-German light heavyweight Danyo Ilunga throwing down with the Netherlands' Michael Duut. Armenian-Belgian power puncher Harut Grigorian battles 23-year-old German prospect Danijel Solaja at welterweight in the can't miss co-headline bout. Plus two Super Bantamweight Grand Prix bouts. Muay Thai champion and MMA star Tiffany van Soest meets Canadian challenger Jessica Gladstone in one semifinal match-up, while 21-year-old Dutch prospect Isis Verbeek takes on undefeated Amel Dehby of France. The winners of each semifinal match-up will advance to the Grand Prix tournament final – the opening bout of GLORY: COLLISION.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The Lightweight title is on the line as Sittichai looks to defend his title against #1 challenger Marat Grigorian. There is also a four-man lightweight tournament on the card.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A four-man one-night heavyweight tournament will take centre stage with the winner punching his ticket into the historic end of year GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix for a chance to win a life-changing $500,000. The four participants are Dutch giant Martin Terpstra (21-5, 11 KO), former light heavyweight title contender Mohamed Amine (29-5, 16 KO), the explosive Bahram Rajabzadeh (62-1, 56 KO), and the bruising power puncher Uku Jürjendal (18-7, 14 KO). A huge international title fight will feature in the co-main event as Tyjani Beztati (24-4, 9 KO) will put his GLORY lightweight championship on the line against Japanese star Kaito Ono (51-6-1, 22 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Vladimir Zenin posts an incredible record, but Nick Agallar is ready for him. Battle hardened from serving in Iraq, this Milwakee brawler will have to be ready for whatever the Red Devil can throw his way. One of the most experienced fighters in the series, Nick Thompson has the scars to prove it. Ansar Chalangov will be looking to come out hard for the Russians. Tara LaRosa solidified her reputation as one of the top female fighters in Mixed Martial Arts in Series 1.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Kaream Ellington is home when he's walking the mean streets of The Bronx or ducking into the gym to train in muay-thai, wrestling and jiu-jitsu. Patt earned an MBA, while still hitting the gym 6 days a week. This fight is about formal training versus the lessons of the street.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coach Brian Bird takes immense pride in his work, not only with competitive fighters, such as UFC Veteran Nick Ring, but with every athlete who enters his gym. His background is in Karate and Kung Fu. However, watching the first UFC event convinced him that he needed to incorporate grappling and Jiu Jitsu into his coaching arsenal. He now runs a well respected MMA club as a family business... and he most enjoys teaching grappling.

programme.title: Cheeni Kam
programme.desc: Cheeni Kum is a heartwarming romantic drama centered on Buddhadev Gupta, a grumpy 64-year-old chef who runs a top Indian restaurant in London. His life takes a turn when he clashes with Nina Verma, a spirited 34-year-old who critiques his cooking. Realizing his mistake, he apologizes, and the two gradually fall in love despite their 30-year age gap. When Buddhadev travels to Delhi to ask Nina's father for her hand, he is shocked and refuses, disturbed by their age difference—especially since Buddhadev is older than him. In protest, Nina’s father begins a satyagraha (fast unto death). The story explores love, age, societal norms, and emotional courage.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E316 This is Fate S1 E316
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Namaste England
programme.desc: Param is besotted with Jasmeet when he watches her dance during a Dussehra celebration. An ambitious Jasmeet wishes to be a jewellery designer, but her father and brother discourage her. They even agree to wed her off to Param, who doesn't want her to work after marriage. Once they get married, Jasmeet tries to coax Param to get UK citizenship even if it means resorting to illegal means. But Param is a man of principles and rejects her ideas. Unknown to him, Jasmeet comes up with a risky plan to fulfill her ambitions.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Jodha Akbar S4 E8
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Simmba
programme.desc: Sangram Bhalerao aka Simmba is an unabashedly corrupt policeman who does not hesitate to make the local ganglord Durva his brother from another mother to ensure a regular inflow of bribes. Meanwhile, Simmba falls in love with Shagun, who runs a catering service next to Miramar Police Station in Goa, where he is stationed. He even finds a sister in a 19-year-old medical student, Aakruti, who teaches orphans in her free time. Soon, Aakruti stumbles upon a drug smuggling ring run by Durva's brothers and is brutally raped and killed. This twist in the tale transforms Simmba and forces him to choose the righteous path.

programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E75 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E75
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts

programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E321 Second Chances S1 E321

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 Jodha Akbar S4 E13
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: A rich playboy Jin Wook starts work in his father's resort as a bellhop. He keeps encounter Yoo Mi.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: After spending a night with Jin Wook, Yoo Mi run away from him. 3 years later, she becomes a nutritionist.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi struggles to meet the unreasonable demands of her boss.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi brings a meal to Jin Wook’s office and she encounters him with Hye Ri. Hye Ri is jealous of Yoo Mi.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi takes Dong Goo to Jin Wook’s house and Dong Goo accidentally breaks an expensive jewelry box.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Jin Wook makes Yoo Mi work overtime to prevent Yoo Mi from spending time together with Hyeon Tae.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi agrees to pay for the jewelry box and medical fees by having dinner with Jin Wook ten times.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi goes to Jin Wook’s house to cook a meal and just about to sit down to eat, Jin Wook’s father drops by.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi and Jin Wook stay at one of the company’s resorts. Meanwhile, in Seoul, Hye Ri visits Hyeon Tae.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: When Dae Bok sees Jin Wook playing with Dong Goo, he thinks that Yoo Mi and Jin Wook had a child.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Hye Ri harasses Yoo Mi. Meanwhile, Dae Bok visits Yoo Mi’s home to find out if Dong Goo is his grandchild.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: After she quits her job, Yoo Mi moves to Daejeon to work at a university. Hyeon Tae comes to visit her.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi blames her mom for her misfortune and goes to the beach where she first met Jin Wook.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi disappears the next morning, but Jin Wook decides to wait until whenever she comes back.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: 1958, Gangwondo. When bumped into the mermaid trapped in small pond, Dam Ryeong releases her into the sea.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae and the mermaid somehow start to live together but the two soon get chased by gangsters at Spain.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: The mermaid starts a tough journey to Seoul to keep her promise with Joon Jae.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Feeling a deja vu, Joon Jae helps the mermaid to get out of the aquarium and the two see fireworks together.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae wonders why he has a slight sense of deja vu to the mermaid, Sim Cheong.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae panics when heard Sim Cheong went to the emergency room but Chi Hyeon says it was just an accident.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae loses his memory of the time he spent with Sim Cheong at Spain. Dong Pyo looks for clues of murder.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae gets confused of his feeling to Sim Cheong. He recalls Yang Seung Gil when ran into Ma Dae Young.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae finds out that Ma Dae Young was the one who had threatened him and was looking for Sim Cheong.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae wonders the meaning of the messages that Dam Ryeong sent through his dream.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Sim Cheong leaves the house in disappointment with Joon Jae. Meanwhile, Dong Pyo learns Ma Dae Young's secret.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae tries to find Sim Cheong worrying that she's been out of contact for days.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae finds something suspicious while looking for the clues of Ma Dae Young's kidnapping of Sim Cheong.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae learns that he is following the same path as his previous life and decides to protect Sim Cheong.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae tries to tell Sim Cheong about his dreams of Dam Ryeong. Sim Cheong invites her friends to the party.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae finally reunite with Yu Ran, his biological mother. Chi Hyeon begins to look for his real father.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Sim Cheong becomes confused when the memory of how Dam Ryeong and she broke up in the past got recalled.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: After the death of Heo Il Joong, Joon Jae and Dong Pyo speed up their investigation.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
